content.query:
CREATE VIEW vwGeography AS
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://nytaxiblob.blob.core.windows.net/2013/Geography',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        FIRSTROW=2
    )
WITH (
    [GeographyID] int,
    [ZipCodeBKey] varchar(10) ,
    [County] varchar(50),
    [City] varchar(50) ,
    [State] varchar(50),
    [Country] varchar(50) ,
    [ZipCode] varchar(50) 
) AS [r];
GO

SELECT * FROM vwGeography
